name: Myra Talcon
content: Myra Talcon was a human female who served as a lieutenant in the Alliance Military. During the evacuation of Yavin 4 following the Rebel Alliance victory at the Battle of Yavin, Lieutenant Talcon was an officer on duty and coordinated Base One's defenses while coordinating with the escaping transports. Talcon later participated in the Battle of Hoth, but was one of several Alliance personnel left behind after the evacuation.
